parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause extended stopping distances, increased risk of accidents, and loss of control, which can lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brakes take a long time to stop the vehicle
the brake pedal becomes hardened and does not stop for a few seconds
the brakes pulse and go to the floor
the vehicle does not stop quickly enough
the brakes seem too small for the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The paint defect can lead to cosmetic damage and potentially affect the vehicle's resale value. The warranty issues can cause frustration and financial burden for the owner.
symptoms: dealer refusal to repair or repaint under warranty.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty Seat Belt Retractors and Buckles
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Malfunctioning seat belt retractors and buckles can compromise the safety of occupants in the event of an accident, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: Seat belts will not retract or latch properly
seat belt buckles break or fail to engage
loss of protection in the event of an accident.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the windshield wipers can reduce visibility during rain or snow, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Wipers turn off while in use
wipers fail to work while turned on

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The detachment of the rearview mirror glass can cause distraction, obstruct the driver's view, and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: Rearview mirror glass comes loose or falls off
rearview mirror glass hits the vehicle's door or body.
